name: RecoveryCafeLexington
0:
”Alexa, launch Recovery Cafe”
”Alexa, open Recovery Cafe”
”Alexa, start Recovery Cafe”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: recovery cafe
Developer Terms of Use
des:
In this voice app experience, you will learn about Recovery Cafe Lexington and it's mission, vision, current needs and how you can help. We provide a safe community space with a resource-rich environment that invites those in greater Lexington to cultivate their recovery, improve their quality of life, and prosper through growth and healing.

Recovery Café Lexington is a Recovery Oriented System of Care, and supports all pathways of recovery.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
